sp_widget.name: Create Workout Plan Form
sp_widget.template: <widget id="createWorkoutPlanForm" name="form" options="{'table':'workout_plans'}"> <instance_option key="view" value="create"/> <instance_option key="default_values" value="{'assigned_to':'${session.user.id}'}"/> <instance_option key="redirect" value="self"/> <instance_option key="submit" value="true"/> <instance_option key="function" value="onSubmit"/> <custom_trigger /> <fields> <field id="short_description" label="Workout Plan Name" mandatory="true"/> <field id="description" label="Description" mandatory="false" type="text"/> <!-- Add more fields as needed --> </fields> <css> <style href="/CSS/styles.css"/> </css> </widget>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_widget"><sp_widget action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><category>custom</category><client_script><![CDATA[api.controller=function() {
  /* widget controller */
  var c = this;
};]]></client_script><controller_as>c</controller_as><css>/* styles.css */

/* Styles for the form container */
.create-workout-plan-form {
    max-width: 500px;
    margin: 0 auto;
}

/* Styles for form fields */
.form-field {
    margin-bottom: 20px;
}

/* Additional styles for form elements */
.form-label {
    font-weight: bold;
}

/* Customize as needed */
</css><data_table>sp_instance</data_table><demo_data/><description/><docs/><field_list/><has_preview>false</has_preview><id/><internal>false</internal><link><![CDATA[function link(scope, element, attrs, controller) {
  
}]]></link><name>Create Workout Plan Form</name><option_schema/><public>false</public><roles/><script><![CDATA[(function() {

})();]]></script><servicenow>false</servicenow><sys_class_name>sp_widget</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-12-03 11:38:46</sys_created_on><sys_id>ab16280397f2311070d034100153afd5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Create Workout Plan Form</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Gym Management" source="x_1117801_gym_mngt">5f9f328a976a311070d034100153af49</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Gym Management">5f9f328a976a311070d034100153af49</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_widget_ab16280397f2311070d034100153afd5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-12-03 12:16:39</sys_updated_on><template><![CDATA[<widget id="createWorkoutPlanForm" name="form" options="{'table':'workout_plans'}">
    <instance_option key="view" value="create"/>
    <instance_option key="default_values" value="{'assigned_to':'${session.user.id}'}"/>
    <instance_option key="redirect" value="self"/>
    <instance_option key="submit" value="true"/>
    <instance_option key="function" value="onSubmit"/>
    <custom_trigger />
    <fields>
        <field id="short_description" label="Workout Plan Name" mandatory="true"/>
        <field id="description" label="Description" mandatory="false" type="text"/>
        <!-- Add more fields as needed -->
    </fields>
  	<css>
        <style href="/CSS/styles.css"/>
    </css>
</widget>]]></template></sp_widget></record_update>
